DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to monitor the renal function of patients who have an antibiotic laden spacer in place to treat an infected hip or knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Renal Function in Patients With an Antibiotic Laden Spacer
DOC.criteria: 1. All patients undergoing a hip or knee resection arthroplasty by the primary investigator 2. Ages 18+ 3. Ability to adhere to follow up schedule 1. Unable to give informed consent 2. Age <18 3. Previous history of infected Total Knee Arthroplasty or Total Hip Arthroplasty 4. History of renal failure or impaired renal function 5. Allergies to aminoglycosides or Vancomycin
